metadata.title: CVE-2024-57664 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the sqlg_group_node component of openlink virtuoso-opensourcev7.2.11 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted SQLstatements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
